pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 5th gen or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD RX480.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
